species.name: bidoof
descriptions: A comparison revealed that Bidoof’s front teeth grow at the same rate as Rattata’s.
Bidoof has an unsophisticated face and is rarely flustered by anything. There have been incidents involving Bidoof sauntering into villages and gnawing on the houses without a single care.
It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.
It lives in groups by the water.  It chews up boulders and trees around its nest with its incisors.
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

abilities.name: simple
abilities.effect: Doubles the Pokémon's stat modifiers.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

abilities.name: unaware
abilities.effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.

abilities.name: moody
abilities.effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.
